ygData.subject: Re: Bronze armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Funny you should ask. I was with a party in The Estate of Unrest Sat night and most of the day Sunday, and we found quite a bit of Sm. bronze armor and a Blood
ygData.messageBody:
Funny you should ask. I was with a party in The Estate of Unrest Sat night
and most of the day Sunday, and we found quite a bit of Sm. bronze armor and
a Blood stained mantle. The bronze armor was mostly on the high level
skeletons and high level ghouls. The blood stained mantle was on The undead
knight of Unrest, a very nasty guy.

I also heard there is bronze on the dry bone skeletons in lake rathe that
only come out at night, but that place is camped BIG time. I am not sure the
size.

Good luck.

Chris AKA Thunderheart
Level 27
Wood-Elf
Druid
Innoruuk server
---=== Divine Wind ===---

-----Original Message-----
From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>

What location, and on what monsters can I find the following:

Sm Bronze Armor
Lg Bronze Armor
Med Bronze Armor
Blood Stained Mantle
